src_original: tyevaṃ yuktimparyeṣate /  sa evaṃ kāmānāmaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvejya yaduta ṣaḍbhirvastubhiḥ prathame dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati nāstyetatsarvaśa audārikatvaṃ  ) prathame dhyāne yadetatkāmadhātāvityanenaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /  prathame ca dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇamayamucyate lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 此初作意聞思猶雜。 自此已後一向修相。 數數思惟此麁靜相數起勝解。

src_original: sa khalveṣa manaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 名勝解作意。

src_original: kleśaprahāṇāya ca mārge samutpanne yastadbhagavato manaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 初斷道生彼俱作意。

src_original: ayamucyate prāvivekyaḥ /
tgt_original: 名遠離作意故。

src_original: sa tatprathamataḥ kāmāvacarakleśādipraheyaprahāṇāttatpakṣye (Śbh_Sh 444)  dauṣṭhulyāpagamācca /
tgt_original: 諸上品煩惱及麁重皆悉已斷。

src_original: tadūrdhvaṃ prahāṇārāmo bhavati /  vivekārāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 復欣樂上斷。

src_original: tasmiṃśca prahāṇānuśaṃsadarśīparīttapravivekaprītisukhasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ kālena kālaṃ prasadanīyena manaskāreṇa /
tgt_original: 見上斷功德已。 觸少分遠離喜樂。

src_original: saṃpraharṣayati /  saṃvejanīyena manaskāreṇa saṃvejayati /  yāvadeva styānamiddhauddhatyāpagamāya (/
tgt_original: 為除惛眠復數修習靜妙作意。 以悅其心。

src_original: ) ayamucyate /  ratisaṃgrāhako manaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 名攝樂作意。

src_original: tasya tathā prahāṇārāmasya bhāvanārāmasya samyakprayuktasya sataḥ kuśalapakṣaprayogopastambhakāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kleśakarmaparyavasthānaṃ carato vā viharato vā na samudācarati /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是行者方便善品所資持故。 令欲界繫中品所攝煩惱纏垢不復現行。

src_original: ) ya[n]nvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyānuśayasyāśeṣaprahāṇāya bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo vihareyaṃ /  bhāvanārāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 復更作意觀察。 便生隨順靜相。

src_original: ayamucte mīmānsāmanaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 名觀察作意。

src_original: (Śbh_Sh 445)  sa bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo viharati /  bhāvanārāmaḥ /  śamathavipaśyanāyuktaḥ /  paunaḥpunyena ca mīmānsate /  tāvatkālikayogena (/
tgt_original: 如是行者數數觀察進修對治。

src_original: sarvakleśaprātipakṣiko manaskāraḥ /  samutpanno bhavatyayamucyate prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ (/)  tasya ca samanaskārapratyayaṃ taddhetukaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /  maulaprathamadhyānasahagato yo manaskāraḥ /  ayamucyate prayoganiṣṭhāphalo manaskāraḥ /  tatra prāvivekye manaskāre vartamāno,
tgt_original: 為令欲界一切煩惱於暫時間得離繫故。 此對治道相應作意是初靜慮最後加行故。

src_original: ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati /  kadācit kenacit pratanukasaṃmukhībhāvayogena prāyoganiṣṭhāmanaskārakālasyārati[ḥ] /  kadācit kadācit dhyānavipulatarasaṃmukhībhāvena prayoganiṣṭhāphale punarmanaskāre vartamānasya nāsti kiñcidasyā(sya) bhavati /  smāraṇīyaṃ sarvataḥ kāyādyuta(dyaduta)
tgt_original: 加行究竟作意。

src_original: ] tatra yo ratisaṃgrāhako manaskāraḥ (/  ) ayaṃ prātipakṣikaśca prasadanīyaśca [/]  tatra yo mīmānsāmanaskāraḥ ayaṃ pratyavekṣaṇāmanaskāraḥ /  ityucyate /  evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ /  tadyathā ānulomikaḥ /  prātipakṣikaḥ /  yathā prathamadhyānasamāpattiḥ saptabhirmanaskārairevaṃ dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasamāpattiḥ /  ākāśavijñānākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiḥ saptabhireva (Śbh_Sh 448)  manaskāraiḥ /  tatra yena vitarkeṣvaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisamvedayate /  avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /  dvitīyadhyānasamāpattaye [/  ] tatra dhyānasamāpannaḥ /
tgt_original: 從此無間證得根本最初靜慮俱行作意。

src_original: pratikramataśca yadabuddhipūrvakamacchandapūrvakaṃ /  a[ntare]ṇa cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanamidamucyate ālokitaṃ /  yatpunarupasaṃkrāntasya buddhipūrvakaṃ prayatnapūrvakaṃ,  kṛtyapūrvakaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanaṃ,
tgt_original: 若不先作意忽爾見色名覩即是卒爾眼識及同時意識。 若先作意復見色等名瞻是等流二識。

src_original: yadvā punaranyeṣāṃ lokacitrāṇāṃ darśanamidamucyate /  vyavalokitaṃ /  yatpunarālokitaṃ ca vyavalokitaṃ ca svalakṣaṇataḥ (Śbh_Sh: 114)  samyageva prajānāti /  yathā āloki(kayi)  tavyaṃ, yathā vyavalokayitavyaṃ tadapisamyageva prajānāti /  idamasyocyate saṃprajanyaṃ [/  ] sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgataḥ /
tgt_original: 言不應覩瞻者謂女色等。

src_original: sacedavalokayamāno jānātyavalokayāmīti /  yaccāvalokayitavyaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ tadālokayati vyavalokayati /  yadā ālokayitavyaṃ,  vyavalokayitavyaṃ /  tadā ālokayati,  vyavalokayati [/  ] yathā ālokayitavyaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ tathā ālokayati,  vyavalokayati /
tgt_original: 知覩瞻時不解勞睡眠或覩破壞興厭行時即可覩瞻餘時不應。

src_original: yadutālokitavyavalokite [/]  tatra katamat saṃmiji(sammiñji)  taṃ, katamat prasāritaṃ,  katamā saṃmiji(sammiñji)  taprasārite saṃprajānadvihāritā /  sa tathā ālokayamāno,  vyavalokayamānaśca /  abhikramapūrvakaṃ,  pratikramapūrvakañca,
tgt_original: 如所應覩等知所為為生長道故須覩瞻若增煩惱不應覩瞻。

src_original: yatpādau vā sammiṃjayati,  bāhū vā saṃmi(miṃ)jayati /  hastau vā saṃmi(miṃ)  jayati, prasārayati /  ityanyatamānyatamamvā aṃgapratyaṃgaṃ sammiñjiyati /  prasārayatīdamucyate /  saṃmi(miṃ)jita prasāritaṃ [/
tgt_original: 第三解屈申中。

src_original: prasāritavyañca /  samyageva prajānāti /  ji(jayi)  tavyaṃ, yadā prasāri(rayi)  tavyaṃ tadapi samyageva prajānāti /  yathā ca saṃmi(miṃ)  ji(jayi)  tavyaṃ, yathā (Śbh_Sh: 115)  prasāri(rayi)  tavyaṃ, tadapi samyageva prajānāti,  idamasyocyate saṃprajanyaṃ /  sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgataḥ /
tgt_original: 謂於先往還覩瞻等時屈申手足臂及餘支節是其屈申。

src_original: sa cet saṃmija(sammiñja)  yamānaḥ(yan)  , prasārayamāṇaḥ(yan) /  jānāti /  saṃmi(miṃ)jayāmi /  prasārayāmīti /  yacca saṃmi(miṃ)  jayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ saṃmi(miṃ)  jayati, prasārayati /  yadā ca saṃmi(miṃ)  jayitavyaṃ,
tgt_original: 知屈申自相者。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ kāyaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何為身者。

src_original: katamā kāye kāyānupaśyanā [/
tgt_original: 問所緣身相。 云何於身住修身觀者。 問能觀體。

src_original: ] katamā (/  ) smṛtiḥ [/
tgt_original: 云何為念住者。

src_original: ] katamā[ni] (/  ) smṛterupasthānāni [/  ] āha /
tgt_original: 問於所緣身不忘失義。 云何念住者。
